<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sc_ic_item_staging</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Delete Sections</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[deleteSections();
function deleteSections() { var section = new GlideRecord("sc_ic_section"); section.addQuery("sc_ic_item_staging", current.sys_id); section.query(); while (section.next()) section.deleteRecord(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2014-09-19 22:02:07</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>1c938d81d7532100a9ad1e173e24d40f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete Sections</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">3607b4283cb1311068bcf327dfe37fee</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1c938d81d7532100a9ad1e173e24d40f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2014-09-19 22:30:56</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1c938d81d7532100a9ad1e173e24d40f"/> </record_update>
